law.text: Either the county or the railroad company dissatisfied with the final judgment of the Circuit Court may appeal to the Court of Appeals in accordance with the Rules of Civil Procedure.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 96. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 13, effective June 16, 1960. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 187, sec. 7.
